abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Incentives and Technical
            Assistance Project is designed to provide technical
            assistance to the Government to formulate specific policy
            measures for a medium-term program of industrial policy
            reforms aimed at assisting in the restructuring of the
            industrial sector. The project will assist the Government
            in: (a) strengthening the institutional framework for
            formulation and coordination of industrial policy by
            providing experts, training of staff, and computer hardware
            and software; (b) developing a set of industrial incentives
            policies and industrial promotion measures aimed at
            stimulating private sector industrial growth, by financing
            the policy analysis studies required for this purpose; and
            (c) improving the efficiency of public sector industrial
            investments in major subsectors.
